item.title: new genin ascension
item.content:encoded:
here is what comes now when you make a character:

** If you refer someone, you get +100 Stamina for the day

You walk up to the Genin Exam, ready to go. Flipper, the Genin Exam Proctor, waves at you. "Hey there, name, are you ready for a long and involved tutorial?"

You punch him in the junk. Right in the junk.

*koff* *koff* "Agh, what the crap! ackk.. *koff* okay, okay, here's the short version:

You start with 150 Stamina a day, which you use to start Missions and Special Missions, Collect Resources for our Village, and so on.

Bonus Stamina is easy to get! There're two bonus codes on your Main page, posting a sig banner will get you Stamina when people click it, not to mention awesome Invite Bonuses!

Your Abilities (Gen, Nin, and Tai) let you attempt to get Successes on Missions.

Jutsu, Teammates, and Items get you bonuses to Levels (more attempts), Strength (better attempts), and Range (higher possible attempts).

Get enough Successes to Defeat a Mission! Get Items, Allies, Jutsu XP, Ability AP, Ryo, and more!

Is the Mission too hard? Use Jutsu! Jutsu cost Chakra and Items. Use Stamina to Charge Chakra, and hit the Store to buy more Items.

Special Missions advance the plot, rank you up, and unlock tons of awesome things, from Reapers to Dance Contests!

You can drink one Potion a day from your Main page! Get Stamina, items, bonuses, and more!

Villages are a bunch of Ninja that can get Village Bonuses, fight other players in the Ninja World War, fight Monsters, get Summons, invade other Villages, and more.

The How to Play covers everything, so you should read it sooner or later.

â€¦agh.."
He was going to say more, but he collapsed. Oh well. You grab him by the collar and drag him off to do some Missions.

You learned the Projectile Weapons: Kunai Jutsu!
You got 15000 Jutsu XP!
You got 250 Ryo!
You got 2 Kunai!
You got +50 Stamina!
You got 1 Bitter Medicine!
You got the ally Flipper! (+1 Levels for Attributes under 3!)
Flipper joined your team!

You are now Genin!
